summary: This mod adds the magnificent birds of Mihail Romanov (Hummingbirds, Fellrunner, Terror Bird) as mounts. Hummingbirds can really fly with SKSE
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/1b50dj4.gif[/img]


[b][size=5][color=#ff0000]HUMMINGBIRDS [/color][/size][/b]

The DLC Dawnguard, and eventually[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/] Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) [/url] or [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/365720/?l=english] Skyrim Script Extender [/url] are required

This mod also works without SKSE but the creatures fly at ground level !


[b]ARMY[/b]

This mod adds the ability to quickly incubate eggs of Hummingbirds with the fire of the forge, and quickly create a swarm of Hummingbirds (5, 15, 50, 100 ...MORE ?...ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !) that are following you as if you were their mother !

To obtain these Hummingbirds eggs, simply bring any “Hummingbird Egg ” (found with some Merchants in Whiterun : [color=#00ff00][i][b]Arcadia of Arcadia’s Cauldron, Anoriath, Hulda of the Bannered Mare [/b][/i][/color]) to a forge and create the "Incubated Hummingbird Egg" in the "misc" section. Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into Hummingbird. The Hummingbird follow you.

When your creatures die, remember to loot their corpses for more eggs

In order to find the eggs at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list when you launch the game


[b]MOUNTS[/b]

You have 3 mounts (with nests) Not very far of [u] the Western Watchtower (Whiterun) [/u] near my [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86989/?] Werewolves House [/url] ; and 3 summonable mounts

To have the SUMMONABLE Mounts, you must buy the 3 “Spell tome: summon XX”, at [color=#00ff00][b]Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach[/b][/color]/Fort Dragon (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais bleu in Solitude).

With the books, you have the spells (Duration of the summon: 1 hour) ...

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell tome: Dismiss Summoned Bird"

In order to buy the 4 books at Farengar, [b][i]you must place this mod at the bottom of the list when you launch the game[/i][/b]


[b][color=#ff0000][size=3]CONTROLS OF THE HUMMINGBIRDS[/size][/color][/b] (with SKSE):

->->->->->->[color=#ff0000][size=5]If you have SKSE you can really fly ![/size][/color]<-<-<-<-<-<-


[color=#ff0000]UP[/color]: [color=#00ff00] Left Shift[/color]

[color=#ff0000]DOWN[/color]: [color=#00ff00] Left Ctrl[/color]

[color=#ff0000]DOWN to the ground quickly[/color]: [color=#00ff00] E or Space[/color]

[color=#00ff00] W[/color] (or Z): [color=#ff0000]forward[/color]

[color=#00ff00] S[/color]: [color=#ff0000]backward[/color]

[color=#00ff00] A[/color] (or Q): [color=#ff0000]turn left[/color]

[color=#00ff00] D[/color]: [color=#ff0000]turn right[/color]


[size=4][color=#ff0000] You MUST mount the Summoned Hummingbirds, dismount and re-mount again before flying ![/color][/size]


When flying press F12 to reconfigure the Keys (...a little problem: it is the default screenshot button on Steam ! You can go into Steam and disabled screenshots)

If there is a problem with the F12 key, uncheck the mod, make a backup and then check again the mod


[b]Bugs or Problems[/b]


[i][b] For the mounts:[/b][/i]

You only have to be careful to not crash into the ground (apparently they can also burrow underground) !

[i]If your mount disappears (with impossibility to dismount): Be patient a few seconds or Zoom out with the scroll Wheel or FAST TRAVEL[/i]




[b] [size=5][color=#ff0000]FELLRUNNER and TERROR BIRD[/color][/size][/b]



For each bird you have 2 Mounts:


1) a Mount located near the Western Watchtower (Whiterun) right next my [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86989/?] Werewolves (Werebeasts) House [/url]


2) a Summonable Mount

To have the SUMMONABLE Mount, you must buy the “Spell tome: summon XXX”, at [b]Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach [/b]/Fort Dragon (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais bleu in Solitude)

With the books, you have the spells (Duration of the summon: 1 hour)

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell tome: Dismiss Summoned Bird"

In order to buy the books at Farengar, [b][i]you must place this mod at the bottom of the list when you launch the game[/i][/b]





[color=#ff0000] [size=5] [b]CREDITS [/b][/size][/color]

[color=#ff0000]Mihail Romanov[/color] for the Fellrunner in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86791/?] Fellrunners- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons - hammerfell- ESO) [/url]; for the Hummingbirds in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86335/?] Hummingbirds- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons - animals) [/url] and for the Terror Bird in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87008/?] Terror Birds- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons - tundra- megafauna) [/url] (« i allways allow other modders to release my mobs as summons and mounts, im happy with that »)

[color=#ff0000]NoxyGame [/color]and [color=#ff0000]DOSMaster [/color]for the script of the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29860/? ] Pegasus MLP fully flyable [/url]
author: gg77
